account_new acc1 10000000

transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    receiverAddress 00
    nonce 0
    value 0
    data 
    gas 1200000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    build

block_connect b01

# Assert best block
assert_best b01

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 300
    data d0e30db0
    gas 100000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    build

block_connect b02

# Assert best block
assert_best b02

# check account/contract balance
assert_balance tx01 300
